meanings.definition: The quality or state of being ethereal.
meanings.sent1: The ethereality of the mist made it seem almost magical.
meanings.sent2: The ethereality of the music transported me to another world.
meanings.sent3: The ethereality of the situation was so dreamlike, I felt like I was in a fairytale.
meanings.sent4: Her ethereal dress added an ethereality to her presence that captivated everyone.
meanings.sent5: The ethereality of the sunset painted the sky in hues of pink and gold.

meanings.definition: The ethereal quality or nature of something.
meanings.sent1: The ethereality of her voice was so soothing, it felt like a gentle breeze.
meanings.sent2: The ethereality of the painting gave it a sense of otherworldly beauty.
meanings.sent3: The ethereality of the dessert made it disappear in seconds!
meanings.sent4: The ethereality of the moment hung in the air like a delicate veil.
meanings.sent5: The ethereality of the flower's petals made them look like delicate whispers.
